import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Nav.css"; import { ReactComponent as CancelIcon } from "./icons/cancel.svg"; import { ReactComponent as BarsSolid } from "./icons/bars-solid.svg"; function Nav() { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState(false); const [activeArray, setActiveArray] = useState([true, false, false, false]); return (
